profile.name: Ben Awad
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer at Voidpet | Full-Stack Developer & Tech Enthusiast
profile.summary: Highly versatile software engineer with a passion for building scalable and efficient full-stack applications. Proficient in JavaScript, GraphQL, React Native, TypeScript, and Node.js. Always looking to expand my skillset and explore new technologies.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Designed and developed multiple full-stack applications using Node.js, GraphQL, and React Native.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to identify and prioritize project requirements.
Improved code quality and efficiency through the implementation of database sharding and caching mechanisms.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed multiple web applications using JavaScript, React, and Node.js.
Provided technical support and guidance to clients on project requirements and implementation.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Maintained and updated multiple open-source projects using JavaScript, GraphQL, and React Native.
Collaborated with other developers to resolve issues and improve project quality.

experience.title: Blogger
description: Created and published multiple blog posts on topics related to software development, technology, and personal growth.
Built and maintained a website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
